caption.p: Effects of olaparib on influenza virus challenge-induced cytokine and chemokine release in the bronchoalveolar lavage fluid (BALF) at day 6 post-infection ( n = 8 for each group). IL-6 (a), MCP-1 (b), G-CSF (c), TNF-α (d), CXCL1 (e), CXCL10 (f), CCL3 (g), and RANTES (h) were measured by ELISA. Data were presented as mean ± SD. ### p < 0.001 compared with the control. * p < 0.05, ** p < 0.01, and *** p < 0.001 compared with IAV
